name: imimorb
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))

stmt.origin: bitr4i(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))
-| wb(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))
-| wb(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))

body.origin: |- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))

stmt.origin: imbi2i(w2, wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)), wi(w2, wi(wi(w0, w1), w1)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))
-| wb(wo(w0, w1), wi(wi(w0, w1), w1))
|- wb(wi(wi(w0, w1), wi(w2, w1)), wi(w2, wo(w0, w1)))

comment: Simplify an implication between implications. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 17-Nov-2012.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 3-Apr-2013.)
